text:
@realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs This is simple. 
Obama is not now, nor will he be again, president. 
Stop the “but remember when..” 
Or “what about...”
Those are in the past, we need to move forward
COVID19 is here and now. 

Trump is the president who needs to show leadership in the handling of this crisis.
